node.name: Spket IDE
node.shortdescription:
Spket IDE is powerful toolkit for JavaScript, XUL/XBL, Laszlo, Flex, SVG, Silverlight and Yahoo! Widget development.



It has following features:


  • JavaScript profile viewer

  • JavaScript Debugger for IE

  • JavaScript formatter

  • Code completion for JavaScript and XML

  • Syntax highlighting for JavaScript and XML

  • Code folding for JavaScript and XML

  • Open declaraction

  • Content outline

  • JavaScript Profile for Ext JS, jQuery, qooxdoo, Firefox 1.5/2.0, Laszlo, SVG, Silverlight and Yahoo! Widget development





What's new:


  • Spket text editor was added, which support CSS/HTML/PHP/Yaml and other languages.

  • A plugin for YUI Compressor was added, which support multi files and JSBuilder format.

  • Custom code folding for region was added.

  • Code assist for Ext now support Ext.Direct, Ext.override and superclass property.

  • Minor bugfixes and feature enhancements.
node.body:
Spket IDE is powerful toolkit for JavaScript, XUL/XBL, Laszlo, Flex, SVG, Silverlight and Yahoo! Widget development.



It has following features:


  • JavaScript profile viewer

  • JavaScript Debugger for IE

  • JavaScript formatter

  • Code completion for JavaScript and XML

  • Syntax highlighting for JavaScript and XML

  • Code folding for JavaScript and XML

  • Open declaraction

  • Content outline

  • JavaScript Profile for Ext JS, jQuery, qooxdoo, Firefox 1.5/2.0, Laszlo, SVG, Silverlight and Yahoo! Widget development





What's new:


  • Spket text editor was added, which support CSS/HTML/PHP/Yaml and other languages.

  • A plugin for YUI Compressor was added, which support multi files and JSBuilder format.

  • Custom code folding for region was added.

  • Code assist for Ext now support Ext.Direct, Ext.override and superclass property.

  • Minor bugfixes and feature enhancements.
